author: Austen Hufford
title: Two More Wynn Resorts Directors to Leave Board
text:
Wynn Resorts Ltd. said two board members—including one who was investigating sexual-misconduct allegations against former Chief Executive Steve Wynn—will leave their posts after Elaine Wynn, the company’s largest shareholder, had pressed for additional board changes.
Wynn Resorts said Monday that John Hagenbuch would no longer stand for re-election to the board and that Robert Miller has resigned as a director.
